body:
I would recommend auto layout.

First of all drag n drop a uiview (after you will make it hidden) make it 1 px height doesn't matter the width (if you want make it 0px from left and right). Now center this view vertical.

Drag your image view and put a vertical spacing with the view (and of course with bottom left and right)

Hope this helps.
title: What constraints should I use to have an image view aspect fill the bottom half of its superview?
